original_text: So think about food that people offer to idols as a sacrifice. I am not saying that the idols are real gods. The food that people offer to them is not special food.
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 무엇을 말하느냐 우상의 제물은 무엇이며 우상은 무엇이냐

sentences.original_text: So think about food that people offer to idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 사람들이 우상에게 바치는 음식에 대해 생각해 보십시오

sentences.original_text: I am not saying that the idols are real gods.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 우상들이 실제 신들이라고 말하는 것이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: The food that people offer to them
